title: Sentinel-1C demonstrates power to map land deformation
summary: Launched just two months ago and still in the process of being commissioned for service, the Copernicus Sentinel-1C satellite is, remarkably, already showing how its radar data can be used to map the shape of Earth’s land surface with extreme precision.

title: Lunar Space Station Module Will Journey to US ahead of NASA’s Artemis IV Moon Mission
summary: A key element of the Gateway lunar space station has entered the cleanroom for final installations after completing environmental stress tests.

summary:
